text: Ravindra Narayana Ravi (born 3 April 1952) is an Indian politician who has been the Governor of Tamil Nadu in 2021. He became the Governor of Nagaland in August 2019. From 2019 to 2020, he was the Governor of Meghalaya. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Nagaland Category:Governors of Meghalaya Category:Governors of Tamil Nadu
title: R. N. Ravi
